Voucher.name: Voucher
Voucher.description: Represents details about a voucher that's issued to a loyalty program member.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account to which the voucher is issued. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

BenefitId.description: The benefit associated with the voucher.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the member.

DiscountPercent.description: The discount percentage associated with the voucher.

EffectiveDate.description: Required. The date the voucher goes into effect.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time from when the voucher is available for redemption. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExpirationDateTime.description: The date and time when the voucher expires and is no longer available for redemption. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The member who has been issued the voucher.

Name.description: The autogenerated number of the voucher.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PromotionId.description: The promotion associated with the voucher.

Reason.description: The reason why the voucher was issued.

RedeemedValue.description: The voucher balance that was redeemed. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

RemainingValue.description: The remaining value of the voucher after partial redemption. This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

ReservationKey.description: The key that's used to redeem a reserved voucher. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ReservedDateTime.description: The date and time when the voucher is reserved for redemption. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ReservedValue.description: The value of the voucher reserved by the customer. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

Status.description: Required. The status of the voucher.

TransactionJournalId.description: The transaction journal associated with the member voucher when the voucher results from accrual of points.

UseDate.description: The date the voucher was used.

VoucherCode.description: The voucher identifier generated by an external system.

VoucherDefinitionId.description: The loyalty voucher definition associated with the voucher.
